title: Trump unveils $1.5 trillion infrastructure plan
text:
Trump unveils $1.5 trillion infrastructure plan 1:00am IST - 02:33 
President Donald Trump unveiled a long-awaited infrastructure plan on Monday that asks the U.S. Congress to authorize $200 billion over 10 years to stimulate $1.5 trillion in improvements paid for by states, localities and private investors. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
